languages.text: {n}Особо яростные крикуны переглядываются между собой. Дама в золотом приседает в реверансе:{/n} "Конечно, Звездное Сиятельство! Неотесанность этой черни видна каждому почтенному дворянину".

{n}The loudest among the onlookers exchange glances. The woman's golden mask bobs as she offers a deep curtsy.{/n} "Most certainly, Your Celestial Highness! His plebeian nature is apparent to every self-respecting aristocrat."
languages.original_text: {n}Особо яростные крикуны переглядываются между собой. Дама в золотом приседает в реверансе:{/n} "Конечно, Звездное Сиятельство! Неотесанность этой черни видна каждому почтенному дворянину".

traits.locale_text: {n}The loudest among the onlookers exchange glances. The woman's golden mask bobs as she offers a deep curtsy.{/n} "Most certainly, Your Celestial {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! His plebeian nature is apparent to every self-respecting aristocrat."

{n}The loudest among the onlookers exchange glances. The woman's golden mask bobs as she offers a deep curtsy.{/n} "Most certainly, Your Celestial {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! His plebeian nature is apparent to every self-respecting aristocrat."

{n}The loudest among the onlookers exchange glances. The woman's golden mask bobs as she offers a deep curtsy.{/n} "Most certainly, Your Celestial {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! His plebeian nature is apparent to every self-respecting aristocrat."

{n}The loudest among the onlookers exchange glances. The woman's golden mask bobs as she offers a deep curtsy.{/n} "Most certainly, Your Celestial {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! His plebeian nature is apparent to every self-respecting aristocrat."

{n}The loudest among the onlookers exchange glances. The woman's golden mask bobs as she offers a deep curtsy.{/n} "Most certainly, Your Celestial Highness! His plebeian nature is apparent to every self-respecting aristocrat."

{n}The loudest among the onlookers exchange glances. The woman's golden mask bobs as she offers a deep curtsy.{/n} "Most certainly, Your Celestial Highness! His plebeian nature is apparent to every self-respecting aristocrat."

languages.text: {n}刚刚叫得最响的人们，此刻交换了一下目光。戴着金色面具的女士深深地行了个屈膝礼，脸上的面具晃动了一下。{/n}“当然如此，大人！对每位懂礼数的贵族而言，他平民的本性都是不言而喻的。”
languages.original_text: {n}The loudest among the onlookers exchange glances. The woman's golden mask bobs as she offers a deep curtsy.{/n} "Most certainly, Your Celestial Highness! His plebeian nature is apparent to every self-respecting aristocrat."

traits.locale_text: {n}刚刚叫得最响的人们，此刻交换了一下目光。戴着金色面具的女士深深地行了个屈膝礼，脸上的面具晃动了一下。{/n}“当然如此，大人！对每位懂礼数的贵族而言，他平民的本性都是不言而喻的。”

languages.text: {n}見物人たちの中で最も騒がしかった者たちが、互いに視線を交わす。その女が深くお辞儀をすると、黄金の仮面がふわりと揺れた。{/n}「もちろんでございます、天の閣下！彼の平民としての本性など、自尊心のある貴族であれば誰の目にも明らかですとも」
languages.original_text: {n}The loudest among the onlookers exchange glances. The woman's golden mask bobs as she offers a deep curtsy.{/n} "Most certainly, Your Celestial Highness! His plebeian nature is apparent to every self-respecting aristocrat."

traits.locale_text: {n}見物人たちの中で最も騒がしかった者たちが、互いに視線を交わす。その女が深くお辞儀をすると、黄金の仮面がふわりと揺れた。{/n}「もちろんでございます、天の閣下！彼の平民としての本性など、自尊心のある貴族であれば誰の目にも明らかですとも」

languages.text: {n}Los más ruidosos de los presentes intercambian una mirada. La máscara dorada de la mujer se ladea al dedicarte una profunda reverencia.{/n} «¡Sin duda, Excelencia Celestial! Su condición de plebeyo resulta obvia para todo aristócrata que se precie de serlo».
languages.original_text: {n}The loudest among the onlookers exchange glances. The woman's golden mask bobs as she offers a deep curtsy.{/n} "Most certainly, Your Celestial Highness! His plebeian nature is apparent to every self-respecting aristocrat."

traits.locale_text: {n}Los más ruidosos de los presentes intercambian una mirada. La máscara dorada de la mujer se ladea al dedicarte una profunda reverencia.{/n} «¡Sin duda, Excelencia Celestial! Su condición de plebeyo resulta obvia para todo aristócrata que se precie de serlo».

languages.text: {n}Kalabalıktaki en çok sesi çıkanlar, birbirlerine bakıyor. Kadının altın maskesi, reverans yaptığı sırada sallanıyor.{/n} "Kesinlikle Semavi Efendimiz! Avam doğası, kendine saygısı olan her aristokrat tarafından kolaylıkla fark edilebilir."
languages.original_text: {n}The loudest among the onlookers exchange glances. The woman's golden mask bobs as she offers a deep curtsy.{/n} "Most certainly, Your Celestial Highness! His plebeian nature is apparent to every self-respecting aristocrat."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kalabalıktaki en çok sesi çıkanlar, birbirlerine bakıyor. Kadının altın maskesi, reverans yaptığı sırada sallanıyor.{/n} "Kesinlikle Semavi Efendimiz! Avam doğası, kendine saygısı olan her aristokrat tarafından kolaylıkla fark edilebilir."

languages.text: {n}Les spectateurs les plus bruyants échangent des regards, tandis que la femme au masque doré vous adresse une profonde révérence.{/n} « J'en suis convaincue, Votre Altesse Célestissime ! Ses origines populaires sont évidentes aux yeux de tout aristocrate qui se respecte. »
languages.original_text: {n}The loudest among the onlookers exchange glances. The woman's golden mask bobs as she offers a deep curtsy.{/n} "Most certainly, Your Celestial Highness! His plebeian nature is apparent to every self-respecting aristocrat."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les spectateurs les plus bruyants échangent des regards, tandis que la femme au masque doré vous adresse une profonde révérence.{/n} « J'en suis convaincue, Votre Altesse Célestissime ! Ses origines populaires sont évidentes aux yeux de tout aristocrate qui se respecte. »

languages.text: {n}Die Lautesten der Umstehenden tauschen Blicke aus. Die goldene Maske der Dame vibriert, als sie einen tiefen Knicks macht.{/n} "Wir sind völlig sicher, Eure himmlische Hoheit! Seine plebejische Herkunft ist für alle Adeligen, die etwas auf sich halten, offensichtlich."
languages.original_text: {n}The loudest among the onlookers exchange glances. The woman's golden mask bobs as she offers a deep curtsy.{/n} "Most certainly, Your Celestial Highness! His plebeian nature is apparent to every self-respecting aristocrat."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Lautesten der Umstehenden tauschen Blicke aus. Die goldene Maske der Dame vibriert, als sie einen tiefen Knicks macht.{/n} "Wir sind völlig sicher, Eure himmlische Hoheit! Seine plebejische Herkunft ist für alle Adeligen, die etwas auf sich halten, offensichtlich."
